languages.text: "Мы преследовали его, но проклятые ксеносы оказались слишком быстры. Они укрылись в поясе астероидов и активировали маскировочное поле. Мы, естественно, прочесали астероиды, но эти твари, без сомнения, воспользовались нашей заминкой, чтобы утереть нам нос и ускользнуть еще дальше. Таково было наше бесславное поражение, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "Мы преследовали его, но проклятые ксеносы оказались слишком быстры. Они укрылись в поясе астероидов и активировали маскировочное поле. Мы, естественно, прочесали астероиды, но эти твари, без сомнения, воспользовались нашей заминкой, чтобы утереть нам нос и ускользнуть еще дальше. Таково было наше бесславное поражение, Ваша Светлость".
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Мы преследовали его, но проклятые ксеносы оказались слишком быстры. Они укрылись в поясе астероидов и активировали маскировочное поле. Мы, естественно, прочесали астероиды, но эти твари, без сомнения, воспользовались нашей заминкой, чтобы утереть нам нос и ускользнуть еще дальше. Таково было наше бесславное поражение, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They hid in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. Naturally, we swept the asteroids, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to thumb their noses at us and slip even further away. And that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, was how we were most ingloriously defeated."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They hid in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. Naturally, we swept the asteroids, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to thumb their noses at us and slip even further away. And that, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, was how we were most ingloriously defeated."

We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: «Iniciamos la persecución, pero los malditos xenos eran demasiado rápidos. Se guarecieron en un cinturón de asteroides y activaron un dispositivo de ocultación. Evidentemente peinamos los asteroides uno por uno, pero no me cabe duda de que las viles criaturas aprovecharon nuestra breve dilación para burlarse de nosotros y poner espacio de por medio. Sufrimos una ignominiosa derrota, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «Iniciamos la persecución, pero los malditos xenos eran demasiado rápidos. Se guarecieron en un cinturón de asteroides y activaron un dispositivo de ocultación. Evidentemente peinamos los asteroides uno por uno, pero no me cabe duda de que las viles criaturas aprovecharon nuestra breve dilación para burlarse de nosotros y poner espacio de por medio. Sufrimos una ignominiosa derrota, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: “我们打算追击它们，但那群可恶的异形跑得太快了。他们躲进小行星带，启动了隐形立场。当然，我们立刻进行了扫描，但那群卑鄙的家伙趁着这短暂的迟疑嘲笑了我们，然后逃之夭夭。这场失败实在是我们的耻辱，大人。”
languages.original_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “我们打算追击它们，但那群可恶的异形跑得太快了。他们躲进小行星带，启动了隐形立场。当然，我们立刻进行了扫描，但那群卑鄙的家伙趁着这短暂的迟疑嘲笑了我们，然后逃之夭夭。这场失败实在是我们的耻辱，大人。”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: « Nous nous sommes lancés à leur poursuite, mais ces maudits xénos étaient trop rapides. Ils se sont réfugiés dans une ceinture d'astéroïdes et ont activé un champ de camouflage. Nous avons, bien entendu, tenté de les retrouver, mais ils ont profité de notre léger retard sur eux pour nous glisser entre les doigts et creuser l'écart. Tel fut notre échec, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous sommes lancés à leur poursuite, mais ces maudits xénos étaient trop rapides. Ils se sont réfugiés dans une ceinture d'astéroïdes et ont activé un champ de camouflage. Nous avons, bien entendu, tenté de les retrouver, mais ils ont profité de notre léger retard sur eux pour nous glisser entre les doigts et creuser l'écart. Tel fut notre échec, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: 「我々は、それを追いかけましたが、忌々しいゼノどもはあまりにも速かったのです。彼らは小惑星帯に隠れ、隠蔽フィールドを作動させました。もちろん、我々は小惑星を掃討しましたが、あの下劣な生き物は間違いなく、我々のわずかな遅れを利用し、我々をあざ笑うかのようにさらに遠くへ逃げていったのです。これは我々の不名誉な敗北でした」
languages.original_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は、それを追いかけましたが、忌々しいゼノどもはあまりにも速かったのです。彼らは小惑星帯に隠れ、隠蔽フィールドを作動させました。もちろん、我々は小惑星を掃討しましたが、あの下劣な生き物は間違いなく、我々のわずかな遅れを利用し、我々をあざ笑うかのようにさらに遠くへ逃げていったのです。これは我々の不名誉な敗北でした」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Wir haben es verfolgt, doch die verfluchten Xenos waren zu schnell. Sie haben sich in einem Asteroidengürtel versteckt und ein Tarnfeld aktiviert. Wir haben die Asteroiden natürlich gescannt, doch diese schändlichen Kreaturen haben unsere kurze Verzögerung gewiss ausgenutzt, um uns auszulachen und dann noch weiter davonzuschlüpfen. So kam es zu unserer schmachvollen Niederlage, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben es verfolgt, doch die verfluchten Xenos waren zu schnell. Sie haben sich in einem Asteroidengürtel versteckt und ein Tarnfeld aktiviert. Wir haben die Asteroiden natürlich gescannt, doch diese schändlichen Kreaturen haben unsere kurze Verzögerung gewiss ausgenutzt, um uns auszulachen und dann noch weiter davonzuschlüpfen. So kam es zu unserer schmachvollen Niederlage, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Peşlerine düştük ama uğursuz zenolar çok hızlıydı. Bir asteroit kuşağına girip maskeleme alanını etkinleştirdiler. Asteroitlerin altını üstüne getirsek de nafile. İğrenç yaratıklar, yaşadığımız gecikmeyi bizimle alay edip daha da uzaklaşmaya kullanmıştır. Utanç verici yenilgimizi böyle yaşadık {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "We pursued it, but the accursed xenos were too fast. They took cover in an asteroid belt and activated a cloaking field. We swept the asteroids, of course, but those vile creatures doubtlessly used our short delay to laugh at us and then slip even farther away. Such was our inglorious defeat, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Peşlerine düştük ama uğursuz zenolar çok hızlıydı. Bir asteroit kuşağında siper alıp gizlenme bölgesi etkinleştirdiler. Asteroitlerin altını üstüne getirdik tabii ama o iğrenç yaratıklar kısa süren gecikmemizi bize gülmek ve daha da uzaklara kaçmak için kullandılar. Utanç verici yenilgimizi böyle yaşadık {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster
